about_the_game:
No predator will resist you with the Predator Pack. Combining force and precision, this complete kit with official rods, reels and lures is a must for catching bass, perch, trout and other predators.

The Predator Pack includes:

2 KastKing brand fishing rods
- Royale Legend casting rod
- Royale Legend spinning rod

2 KastKing brand reels
- Sharky III – 5000
- Speed Demon

3 Strike King brand lures
- Pro-Model Crankbait Series 6XD Rootbeer
- KVD Sexy Splash Topwater Bait - Chrome Blue
- KVD J300 Jerkbait - Chrome Sexy Shad

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-6400/AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-8400/AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Catch predators such as barracuda and perch with this complete kit of official KastKing and Strike King rods, reels and lures.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
